name: Thelittlenightmares... by a loser
description:
I made this game in my free time for the Retro Jam.

It's my first jam and second game.

All tou have to do is follow the light.

The theme is restart, like geometry dash, you lose and restart, over and over again.

Thanks:

 Joiro Hatgaya for the 8 bits fonts.

Vitor Ottoni(https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBDRq3eeN1iMDPJULPe8PeA) for the music.

Controls:

A = Left

D = Right

Space bar = jump
